ygData.subject: New Yahoo! Club - Rogue's Hideout
ygData.msgSnippet: Through my own Rogue character on The Tribunal server, I have come to love the Rogue class. However, I have had great difficulty in finding dedicated
ygData.messageBody:
Through my own Rogue character on The Tribunal
server, I have come to love the Rogue class.<br>However,
I have had great difficulty in finding dedicated
resources relating to the Rogue class on the Internet (e.g.
Web sites), or Rogue only player Guild on my
Server.<br> <br>Since the only people that really understand
us are our fellow Rogues, a new Yahoo! Club was
founded today, with the explicit intention of encouraging
and maybe assisting the creation of Rogue only
Internet resources (hopefully Web sites) and EQ player
Guilds and the promotion of these.<br> <br>Please use
the following link, join the club and contribute, if
you wish to assist me in this quest.<br>
<br><a href=http://clubs.yahoo.com/clubs/rogueshideout target=new>http://clubs.yahoo.com/clubs/rogueshideout</a><br> <br>(Please feel free to promote your own lists
and any other dedicated EQ Rogue resources in Rogue's
Hideout)<br> <br>Knave, 10th Level Rogue (Backstab's a
killer)<br>The Tribunal.
